title: Should The Packers Sign Colin Kaepernick (Football 11/08)
description:
Nick Kostos, Pete Prisco, Will Brinson and Jason La Canfora discuss if the Packers should consider signing Colin Kaepernick, who will claim Wild Card spots in the AFC, and generate some headlines. Then this week's edition of 'Hot Take or Just Right' which morphs into 'Clicks or Giggles' as Nick, Pete, Will, and Jason answer if Blake Bortles is the best QB in the AFC South, if Jared Goff will go down as the best QB from the 2016 draft class, if the Eagles-Cowboys Week 17 showdown will be for the division title, and more!
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
